metadata.title: Intro Audio of Vowels and Consonants

params.text: There are five vowels in the English alphabet. They are a, e, i, o and u.

params.audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support this audio

params.text: There are 21 consonants in the English alphabet. They are b, c, d, f, g, h, j, k, l, m, n, p, q, r, s, t, v, w, x, y and z.

questions:
a) One sunny day, R*ose* went to the garden.

b) Rose saw many things in the g*arden*.

c) There were many b*irds* in the garden.

d) There were dandelions near the f*ence*.

e) The garden was very b*eautiful*.

params.taskDescription: Mark all the words that should begin with a capital letter.
params.textField:
a) *we* ride bicylces in the park.

b) *he* has five pencils.

c) *the* teacher was very happy with *dhiren*.

d) My name is *rusha*.

e) *on* *monday* my sister and I are going on a picnic.
